short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use '/' in the nav bar, then space or tab, followed by a shortcut command key to access favourite sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Manage and streamline your browsing with the Slash extension! Easily add, view, or remove shortcuts. To use your shortcuts, simply type '/' in the navigation bar, followed by a space or tab, and input your command to swiftly navigate to your desired site
